item.title: Cyprus offers Syrians resettlement money to return home, migration minister says

item.title: Svalbard, Chios, El Hierro: How these European islands have successfully avoided overtourism
item.description: With limited land and fragile infrastructure, islands are some of the destinations worst affected by mass tourism.
